ing: 1 teaspoon honey, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "My best attempt at duplicating a delicious recipe from a local restaurant. It's the perfect blend of salty and sweet! Serve as a sandwich on a croissant, sourdough bread, or pretzel bun or with lettuce for a delightful lunchtime treat."
ins: Mash avocado, mayonnaise, sour cream, garlic powder, lemon juice, and honey together in a bowl until smooth and creamy; season with salt and pepper. Fold chicken, onion, and celery into avocado mixture until coated.
